DOC.brief_summary: This open-label extension ( OLE ) study design evaluate long-term efficacy , safety , tolerability ABT-494 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Long-Term Efficacy , Safety , Tolerability Repeated Administration ABT-494 Subjects With Crohn 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Participant must complete Study M13740 Week 52 . If female , participant must postmenopausal , surgically sterile use birth control method . For reason participant consider investigator unsuitable candidate Female participant positive pregnancy test Baseline consider become pregnant study . Participant compliance prior concomitant medication requirement procedures throughout Study M13740 .
